title: Technical Architect
description: Developing and maintaining a scalable SaaS-based, multi-tenant flight booking application and REST APIs.
responsibilities: Serving as a full-stack individual contributor in a team of 10+ lead-level members.
Built responsive interfaces with Vue.js and developed backend services using .NET Core.

title: Lead Technology
description: Built and maintained an enterprise-grade GS1 barcode management application and supporting APIs.
responsibilities: Led a 4-member team while contributing as a full-stack individual contributor.
Built responsive interfaces with Vue.js, developed backend services using .NET Core and Python, and collaborated with cross-functional teams.

title: Tech Lead
description: Built and maintained large-scale, data-centric housing insurance (P&C) applications, APIs, data scrapers, and a custom search engine.
responsibilities: Led and contributed as a full-stack individual contributor in a 7-member team.
Built user interfaces with Vue.js and developed backend services using .NET MVC and .NET Core.
Developed a search engine using Elasticsearch and built data scrapers with Python Scrapy.

title: Sr. Software Engineer
description: Built and maintained a social networking web application.
responsibilities: Built web applications using ASP.NET and DNN as a full-stack individual contributor.

title: Sr. Software Engineer
description: Built and maintained multiple small to medium-sized web applications.
responsibilities: Built web applications using ASP.NET and DNN as a full-stack individual contributor.
